data.text: This week in The Hague: Organisation for the Prohibition of #ChemicalWeapons (@OPCW) Executive Council Meeting. Info & Documents here https://t.co/6QcW9vpJnc https://t.co/ugC0yb4ovf
Support gender equality & women's empowerment around the world. @UN_Women has ideas how: https://t.co/hXdPIZ7UIE #GlobalGoals https://t.co/XsplJrjcDN
What's happening this week at the UN? #DayOfTheGirl, #WorldPostDay ✉, World Mental Health Day & much more. List of events is here: https://t.co/TJQALilB14 https://t.co/abFmFQXD8g

There are clear benefits to limiting global warming to 1.5ºC rather than 2ºC or higher, new @IPCC_ch report confirms. Every bit of warming matters. https://t.co/oIrUQkyFMJ #ClimateAction https://t.co/MWgAqghgej
#ICYMI-- Gender parity in senior UN leadership was evident on the #UNGA podium. Learn more about @antonioguterres' vision: https://t.co/l3llUUaMJu https://t.co/GSAkAD8V54

By 2030, towns and cities will be home to almost 5 billion people.  

Better urban planning & management can make cities safe, inclusive, resilient and sustainable. More: https://t.co/Uj6AAWanOZ #UrbanOctober https://t.co/l8JIkQAR0o

As we mark the 70th anniversary of the #PreventGenocide Convention, read why it's as important as ever that the remaining 45 countries ratify the groundbreaking human rights treaty. https://t.co/f23i31RRdg https://t.co/QoW9sKqkpw

📷: "Rainbow Dream" by Maximilian Ziegler is 1 of 13 winners of @WMO's 2019 Calendar Competition under the theme "The Sun, the Earth & the Weather". Have a look at the others here: https://t.co/5JKtRHmyC4 https://t.co/KKYu2kJu4U

Fatima is one of the many displaced people receiving food from @WFP in conflict-affected northeast Nigeria. 

A former abductee, she carried her sick daughter for 3 days before reaching Bama camp: https://t.co/PIYUILvnaS https://t.co/g9qhAow1jI

It takes many countries to make @UNPeackeeping a success. This week, 30 Vietnamese 🇻🇳 doctors arrived in South Sudan🇸🇸 on an Australian 🇦🇺 plane to replace the UK 🇬🇧 medical contingent. https://t.co/mpu6OEywoX via @unmissmedia https://t.co/2E7m50KwEm

“There is a simple truth that we all recognize: more women in peacekeeping means more effective peacekeeping.”
-- @Lacroix_UN joined us live at #UNGA to discuss the future of @UNPeacekeeping & more. Watch: https://t.co/nXR6zVs9CR https://t.co/OuI3urJT5I

“I decided that I wanted to do good, I wanted to give back to my community and I wanted to invest in my community.” - @NyleDiMarco on what's inspired his work as a disabilities advocate. Watch: https://t.co/cQVL2pgl3u #GlobalGoals https://t.co/pE6TPYQ45o

"With the touch of a button you can inspire change." -- @UNEnvironment Goodwill Ambassador @AidanRGallagher visited the UN this week to encourage young people to take #ClimateAction. Find out what YOU can do: https://t.co/fXksYA7O1x https://t.co/JWzbk0o15G

#LGBTI RIGHTS = HUMAN RIGHTS

"I don't go to bed every night thinking about the children we saved. I go to bed every night thinking about the children we couldn't save because of lack of money." -- @WFPChief on the fight for #ZeroHunger. Watch ➡️ https://t.co/PPNx4xlXYS https://t.co/IeEB6c1HYf

"It starts with making a choice about the kind of man you want to be in the world. Men need to join the fight." -- @BlackPanther star @Winston_Duke shares why he's standing up for gender equality. Watch: https://t.co/DAzAyesY40 #GlobalGoals https://t.co/eqckQ7Dotf

"To help others you must relate to their pain."
-- Nobel Laureate @DenisMukwege on his work supporting victims of sexual violence in conflict. 🎧 in Kiswahli ⬇️ https://t.co/Nb2DVFTZLc

Do you remember your favourite teacher?

The UN family honours the contributions of @NobelPrize laureates @DenisMukwege & @UNODC Goodwill Ambassador @NadiaMuradBasee for their tireless work to end the use of sexual violence in armed conflict. https://t.co/ZQ1bOj3gk3 #Standup4humanrights

Over 200 million women & girls alive today have experienced female genital mutilation in 30 countries across 3 continents. This is what the UN is doing to #EndFGM: https://t.co/F3xnFYERQH https://t.co/8BzsG2QtnQ
As the 🌍's largest humanitarian agency fighting hunger worldwide, @WFP delivers lifesaving nutrition to those most in need. Help achieve #ZeroHunger: https://t.co/nlUtZ4qVrX https://t.co/TSv1TVVc8h

Intl Court of Justice on Iran vs USA: both Parties must refrain from any action which might aggravate or extend the dispute before the Court or make it more difficult to resolve. Additional info is here: https://t.co/Ooa7nNYUVJ https://t.co/gYdqodXZyC
Follow @UNinHindi to get updates from @antonioguterres' visit to India and to find out about other interesting events from around the UN system in Hindi. https://t.co/Obz9c1N5YX

🚰 Access to safe drinking water is a basic human right & essential for good health. The #GlobalGoals aim to bring safe water to everyone. 💧 #EveryDrop counts! https://t.co/6DwQJNQyFj https://t.co/inJ7bzOH0J

The International Court of Justice is the principal judicial organ of the UN & works to settle legal disputes between countries & gives advisory opinions in accordance with intl law. 

Info: https://t.co/79l2as3tcR https://t.co/GkqSxx0g0M
Indonesia update: UN agencies & partners warn that some communities have yet to be reached & death toll may rise, as the scale of the destruction unfolds. Video & more ⬇️ https://t.co/rSg9DSzJqy

More than 1/3 of the world's countries criminalize same-sex relationships. Info on the @UNHumanRights @free_equal campaign against homophobia & transphobia is here: https://t.co/Ljui9G92Ag #LoveIsLove #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/av3xTDdVbR

Some 2.6 million Venezuelans are displaced & around 5,000 are leaving the country daily – the largest population movement in Latin America’s recent history. See what @Refugees is doing to help: https://t.co/7CEdSbD1KA #WithRefugees https://t.co/LY3zbj9O68

Tuesday is Int'l Day of Non-Violence - in honor of Mahatma Gandhi's birthday - a leader who remained committed to the principle of non-violence, even in the most difficult circumstances. https://t.co/kEIYysJEuI https://t.co/r2tdIEx5GO

On Tuesday's Day of Non-Violence, @antonioguterres honours Mahatma Gandhi at the Raj Ghat memorial in Delhi, India - kicking off the 150th anniversary year of Gandhi's birth https://t.co/HDWc3Kg9xr https://t.co/tcmXdee5zU

What's it like to host 100+ of world leaders at the biggest diplomatic event of the year? Thanks to @AminaJMohammed for giving the UN's video team special exclusive access during #UNGA week. Watch it here. https://t.co/mbgxGdt11R

Global challenges require global solutions. 

#UNGA annual high-level debates wrap up, reaffirm critical role of international cooperation for peace, security, #globalgoals, #climateaction + much more.
